admin.AD_DESC:
‚ù∞üêºüß≠Sketchyüß≠üêº‚ù±

‚ôê COMMAND: *.ban*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Remove someone from the group. Mention the message or tag a person to use command.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.add*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Adds someone to the group.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.mute*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Mute group chat. Messages can only be sent by admin. 

‚ôê COMMAND: *.unmute*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Remove group chat mute. Anyone can send a message.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.clear*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Clearing chat.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.name*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Change group name. 

‚ôê COMMAND: *.promote*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Promoting members to admin.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.demote*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Demoting admins.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.myplugin*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: To view the current plugin list from ‚ù∞üêºüß≠Sketchyüß≠üêº‚ù±.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.plug*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Install external plugins.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.unplug*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Removes the plugin.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.invite*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Provides group invitation link.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.afk*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: It turns bot bot AFK - Away From Keyboard.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.restart*
‚û¢ DESCRIPTION: Restart the bot.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.shutdown*
‚û¢ DESCRIPTION: Shutdown the Bot.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.setvar*
‚û¢ DESCRIPTION: Change heroku config vars.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.getvar*
‚û¢ DESCRIPTION: Get heroku config var.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.speedtest*
‚û¢ DESCRIPTION:Check download and upload speed.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.filter*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: It adds filters. If someone writes your filter word, it sends the answer. If you write a .filter it will show your list of filters.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.stop*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Stops the filters you added earlier.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.welcome*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: It sets the welcome message.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.goodbye*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Sets the goodbye  message.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.kickme*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: It removes the bot from the group that provided the command.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.pp*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: The photo you mention mentions the bot profile photo.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.block*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Block tagged user.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.unblock*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Unblock tagged user.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.jid*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Giving user JID.

‚ôê COMMAND *.tagall*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Tag everyone in group.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.up*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Check for updates.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.upsketchy*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: To update your bot.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.dyno*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Showing heroku dyno hours.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.sysd*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Show system properties.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.scam*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Scam actions for 5min.

‚ôê COMMAND: *.antilink*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Anti link on Ex: .antilink on/off

‚ôê COMMAND: *.antibad*
‚ÑπÔ∏è DESCRIPTION: Remove bad word users Ex: .antibad on/off

‚ôê COMMAND: *.chatbot*
‚ÑπÔ∏èDESCRIPTION: Auto chat on Ex: .chatbot on/off
üëø Command: .voice on/off
‚ñ∑ Description: Activate and deactivate voice chat

updater.INVALID_HEROKU: *‚ùå Your HEROKU_API_KEY wrong! Visit https://dashboard.heroku.com/account . Scroll down to API key. Click reveal buttong. Copy that API key and paste it in HEROKU_API_KEY config vars.*

conventer.XMEDƒ∞A_DESC: A plugin that have 25 media tools.
conventer.T_FALSE:
```‚ùå Incorrect Blend Effect Entered!```
```üîé Existing Commands:```

*$dodge* - Applies a pink color filter to the video.
*$multiply* - Applies a green color filter to the video.
*$grainmerge* - Increases the contrast of the video.
*$and* - Applies black lightning effect according to the speed of the video.
*$or* - Applies a white lightning effect according to the speed of the video.
*$burn* - Applies green contrast to video.
*$difference* - Shows the differences by applying green relief to the video.
*$grainextract* - Shows the differences by applying gray relief to the video.
*$divide* - Demonstrates the differences by applying a pink relief to the video.
*$xor* - Applies both green relief and lightning effect to video.
*$hardmix* - Mixes the colors of the video into a yellow and red tone.
*$negation* - Turns the dynamics of the video to pink.
conventer.T_NOT:
```üí≠ You Need To Enter Any Blend Effects!
```üîé Existing Commands:```

*$dodge* - Applies a pink color filter to the video.
*$multiply* - Applies a green color filter to the video.
*$grainmerge* - Increases the contrast of the video.
*$and* - Applies black lightning effect according to the speed of the video.
*$or* - Applies a white lightning effect according to the speed of the video.
*$burn* - Applies green contrast to video.
*$difference* - Shows the differences by applying green relief to the video.
*$grainextract* - Shows the differences by applying gray relief to the video.
*$divide* - Demonstrates the differences by applying a pink relief to the video.
*$xor* - Applies both green relief and lightning effect to video.
*$hardmix* - Mixes the colors of the video into a yellow and red tone.
*$negation* - Turns the dynamics of the video to pink.
